name: IIPLA Global IP Summit 2015 London
content: IIPLA Global IP Summit 2015 is the next step towards the unification of IP trends Worldwide. IIPLA Global IP Summit aims to create an International Forum of Intellectual Property for In-house IP lawyers, partners, IP Agencies, Law Firms and providers of other services in the legal industry. IIPLA Global IP Summit facilitates exchange of experience & ideas and encourage cross border cooperation. Thus, IIPLA Global IP Summit would enrich the participants with IP knowledge, resources and its application in future.
